com.powerdata.openpa.tools.matrix

Class FactorizedFltMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.powerdata.openpa.tools.matrix.FactorizedFltMatrix

  • public class FactorizedFltMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Keep a more efficient version of the float-valued factorized sparse matrix.
